alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 2:31AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Craven and Carteret Counties through 330 AM EST... At 229 AM EST, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lowland to near South River to near Pine Knoll Shores. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Mesonet. This line of thunderstorms has a history of producing wind gusts up to 40 mph, including a 41 mph wind gust measured in Havelock. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Cedar Island, Harkers Island, South River, North River, Sealevel, Marshallberg, Davis, Smyrna, Merrimon, Straits, Atlantic, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Otway, Great Neck, Williston, Open Grounds Farm, Stacy and Bettie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret
